languages.text: {n}В реве несущегося локомотива вам слышится сердитый рокот моторов и визг лопастей из далекого {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}прошлого{/d}. На мгновение вы возвращаетесь в прошлое и вновь угрюмо наблюдаете, как тысячи солдат набиваются в Химеры и Валькирии, чтобы броситься в отчаянную атаку. Они не вернутся, потому что вы велели им умереть.{/n}

{n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. They will not return, because you have commanded them to die.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В реве несущегося локомотива вам слышится сердитый рокот моторов и визг лопастей из далекого {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}прошлого{/d}. На мгновение вы возвращаетесь в прошлое и вновь угрюмо наблюдаете, как тысячи солдат набиваются в Химеры и Валькирии, чтобы броситься в отчаянную атаку. Они не вернутся, потому что вы велели им умереть.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el rugido del tren, cada vez más cercano, distingues el temblor de los motores en ignición y el chirrido de las cuchillas giratorias del {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}pasado{/d} lejano. Durante un momento, te encuentras en otra época: vuelves a observar taciturn{mf|o|a} a miles de soldados embutirse en Chimeras y Valkyries para realizar una ofensiva desesperada. No volverán, porque les has ordenado morir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. No volverán, porque les has ordenado morir.{/n}

languages.text: {n} 迫り来る列車の轟音の中、あなたは遠い{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}昔{/d}のエンジン音と回転する刃の悲鳴が聞こえた。一瞬、あなたは別の時代にタイムスリップし、何千人もの兵士がキメラやヴァルキリーに詰め込まれ、絶望的な攻勢に出るのを再びしげしげと眺めた。彼らは戻ってこない。あなたが彼らに死を命じたからだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. They will not return, because you have commanded them to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} 迫り来る列車の轟音の中、あなたは遠い{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}昔{/d}のエンジン音と回転する刃の悲鳴が聞こえた。一瞬、あなたは別の時代にタイムスリップし、何千人もの兵士がキメラやヴァルキリーに詰め込まれ、絶望的な攻勢に出るのを再びしげしげと眺めた。彼らは戻ってこない。あなたが彼らに死を命じたからだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在列车扑面而来的轰鸣中，你听到了仿佛来自遥远{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}过去{/d}的声音——引擎启动的轰隆声，以及叶片旋转时发出的刺耳声音。那一刻，你感觉自己仿佛回到了过去。再一次，你面色阴沉，看着成千上万的士兵涌入奇美拉装甲车与女武神，发起破釜沉舟的进攻。这些士兵再也回不来了，因为你命令他们去战场上送死。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. They will not return, because you have commanded them to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在列车扑面而来的轰鸣中，你听到了仿佛来自遥远{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}过去{/d}的声音——引擎启动的轰隆声，以及叶片旋转时发出的刺耳声音。那一刻，你感觉自己仿佛回到了过去。再一次，你面色阴沉，看着成千上万的士兵涌入奇美拉装甲车与女武神，发起破釜沉舟的进攻。这些士兵再也回不来了，因为你命令他们去战场上送死。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Im Gebrüll des nahenden Zugs hörst du das Grollen startender Motoren und das Kreischen wirbelnder Klingen aus ferner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Vergangenheit{/d}. Für einen Augenblick befindest du dich in einer anderen Zeit, und du siehst erneut voller Wut, wie Tausende von Soldaten in Chimären und Walküren steigen, um eine verzweifelte Offensive zu starten. Sie werden nicht zurückkehren, denn dein Befehl hat sie in den Tod geschickt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. They will not return, because you have commanded them to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Im Gebrüll des nahenden Zugs hörst du das Grollen startender Motoren und das Kreischen wirbelnder Klingen aus ferner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Vergangenheit{/d}. Für einen Augenblick befindest du dich in einer anderen Zeit, und du siehst erneut voller Wut, wie Tausende von Soldaten in Chimären und Walküren steigen, um eine verzweifelte Offensive zu starten. Sie werden nicht zurückkehren, denn dein Befehl hat sie in den Tod geschickt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans le rugissement du train à l'approche, vous percevez le vrombissement de moteurs au démarrage et le hurlement de pales rotatives, autant de bruits qui vous évoquent un lointain {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}passé{/d}. L'espace d'un instant, vous êtes {mf|transporté|transportée} en un autre temps et un autre lieu, où vous êtes de nouveau le témoin impuissant de l'embarquement de milliers de soldats à bord de Chimères et de Valkyries se préparant à un assaut désespéré. Ils n'en reviendront pas, car vous leur avez donné ordre de se battre jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. They will not return, because you have commanded them to die.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans le rugissement du train à l'approche, vous percevez le vrombissement de moteurs au démarrage et le hurlement de pales rotatives, autant de bruits qui vous évoquent un lointain {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}passé{/d}. L'espace d'un instant, vous êtes {mf|transporté|transportée} en un autre temps et un autre lieu, où vous êtes de nouveau le témoin impuissant de l'embarquement de milliers de soldats à bord de Chimères et de Valkyries se préparant à un assaut désespéré. Ils n'en reviendront pas, car vous leur avez donné ordre de se battre jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaklaşmakta olan trenin çıkardığı gürültü sana {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}geçmişten{/d} bir anıyı, o gün çalışmaya başlayan motorların gümbürtüsünü ve dönen bıçakların cırıltısını hatırlatıyor. Bir anlığına başka bir zamana gidip binlerce askerin çaresizce taarruz ettiğini, Kimeralar ve Valkürler ile çarpıştığını görüyorsun. Ölmelerini emrettiğinden asla geri dönemeyeceklerini biliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the roar of the oncoming train, you hear the rumble of starting engines and the screeching of spinning blades from the distant {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}past{/d}. For a moment, you are transported to a different time, where you once again watch sullenly as thousands of soldiers cram into Chimeras and Valkyries to go on a desperate offensive. They will not return, because you have commanded them to die.{/n}
